collection.name: PipelineColorBlendAttachmentState
collection.desc: Structure specifying a pipeline color blend attachment state.

member.name: blendEnable
member.desc: Controls whether blending is enabled for the corresponding color attachment. If blending is not enabled, the source fragmentâ€™s color for that attachment is passed through unmodified.

member.name: srcColorBlendFactor
member.desc: Selects which blend factor is used to determine the source factors (Sr,Sg,Sb).

member.name: dstColorBlendFactor
member.desc: Selects which blend factor is used to determine the destination factors (Dr,Dg,Db).

member.name: colorBlendOp
member.desc: Selects which blend operation is used to calculate the RGB values to write to the color attachment.

member.name: srcAlphaBlendFactor
member.desc: Selects which blend factor is used to determine the source factor Sa.

member.name: dstAlphaBlendFactor
member.desc: Selects which blend factor is used to determine the destination factor Da.

member.name: alphaBlendOp
member.desc: Selects which blend operation is use to calculate the alpha values to write to the color attachment.

member.name: colorWriteMask
member.desc: A bitmask of vulkan.ColorComponent flags specifying which of the R, G, B, and/or A components are enabled for writing, as described for the [pragma:url?https://www.khronos.org/registry/vulkan/specs/1.1-extensions/html/vkspec.html#framebuffer-color-write-mask]Color Write Mask[/pragma:url].
